title: [CLIENT PROBLEM] Logging onto chat service....
body:
I cannot play with any of my friends as I cant log on to the chat service, Ive tried changing the date etc without success, anyone got a fix that might help?

Thanks

replies.body:
There were some issues going on with the EUW chat service yesterday, which should be resolved by now. 

If you still have issues that are preventing your from chatting or playing with friends, let me know.

my main is hacked atm and i already send ticket but it takes long but nvm  so im playing on a smurf and it will not logging onto cgat service had i some days agao on my main b4 it was hacked (Lightsurfer main) (Rylure smurf)
Having the same problem since today looking forward for solutions.
RIOT please fix this issue its doing my head in!
same here i'm dying to play :'({{item:3070}}

Hey! I saw your comment because I was looking for information about the same issue... nothing works for me either trying to log onto the chat... ;( This has lasted for 3 days now and I can't seem to fix it.
